sentence.Network_en: In some translations she is referred to as a deaconess RSV.
sentence.Network_cn: 在某些译本中,非比被称为“女执事”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... deacon 执事 deaconess 女执事 deaconry 执事.
女执事 (罗:16:1),教会历来有女执事 ,在圣公会称为女会吏( DEACONESS )。协助牧师，可分圣餐（不能主礼全部圣餐礼），施洗、 …
达九年的心脏病专家、现领导戴肯尼斯(Deaconess)医院心身医学研究所的本森说。
...本词条内容尚未完善，欢迎各位，贡献自己的专业知识！deaconess n. 女执事, 牧师的女助手附图

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from deacon + -ess, on the pattern of late Latin diaconissa

auth_sentence.content: Recently, I met with Dr. David Vernick, an ear-nose-and-throat specialist at my hospital, Beth Israel Deaconess.
